Test your knowledge and earn stars by answering questions correctly!

 Rules:
 • Each quiz has multiple choice questions
 • You have 30 seconds to answer each question
 • Correct answers earn you stars based on difficulty
 • You can attempt up to 10 quizzes per day
 • Watch ads to get extra attempts

Play our exciting Color Puzzle game to earn stars!

 Rules:
 • Sort the colors to match the pattern
 • Faster completion gives more stars
 • Earn 5-10 stars per minute based on performance
 • No daily limit on game plays
 • Practice to improve your speed and earn more!
You have already used a referral code
Earn rewards by playing games and completing quizzes
Complete daily challenges to earn bonus points
Convert your points to real money rewards
By creating account or logging in, you agree to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

These Terms and Conditions govern your use of PixelPayout. By using our app, you agree to these terms.

 1. Account Creation
 - You must provide accurate information
 - You are responsible for maintaining account security

 2. Points and Rewards
 - Points are earned through legitimate gameplay
 - We reserve the right to verify point accumulation
 - Points have no monetary value until redeemed

 3. Fair Play
 - Cheating or exploitation will result in account termination
 - Multiple accounts are not permitted

Privacy Policy for PixelPayout

 1. Information We Collect
 - Account information (email, name)
 - Game activity and points earned
 - Device information

 2. How We Use Information
 - To provide and improve services
 - To verify rewards eligibility
 - To prevent fraud

 3. Data Security
 - We implement industry-standard security measures
 - Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest
